actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide that the funds allocated for fiscal year 1973 under the rural environmental assistance program shall be expended.

summary.text: Provides that the funds allocated by the Secretary of Agriculture for the purpose of carrying into effect the rural environmental assistance program pursuant to the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act for fiscal year l973, shall be fully expended for such purpose in such fiscal year.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the funds allocated for fiscal year 1973 under the rural environmental assistance program shall be expended.
